snippet: National parks like the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area were open to enthusiastic visitors on Thursday after a deal was reached to end the government shutdown.
abstract: National parks like the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area were open to enthusiastic visitors on Thursday after a deal was reached to end the government shutdown.

headline.main: Runners and Bikers Descend on a Reopened California Park
